about_the_game:
The Kingdom of Daanco is in danger! A great evil is preparing to launch a full-scale attack! When Saucey mysteriously finds himself within Daanco, he is forced into helping the King unite the people of Daanco! They must all work together to make a stand against those that threaten the peace. Embark on this adventure to help Saucey and friends save Daanco!

Battle Features

  • 3 vs 3 Turn-Based Combat
  • Complete button prompts during your attacks to deal more damage
  • Use items for extra buffs, healing, and effects
  • Run away from enemies if you really want to
  • Use different party members with unique abilities and stats
  • Lots of unique enemies and bosses to fight
  • Secret superbosses to discover

Story Features

  • Epic, silly, and fun main quest
  • Meet new friends who join your party
  • Character specific side quests
  • Explore the Kingdom of Daanco on your adventures
  • Mysterious characters are causing trouble
  • There's deeper lore to uncover!
